IntroductionAndWhoWeAre: The Economist Group places high importance on your privacy. This privacy policy provides a comprehensive overview of how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. We recognize the significance of transparency and trust in our relationship with you. Ensuring your enjoyment of our products, services, and websites in a safe and secure manner is equally paramount. This policy outlines the methods by which we collect and utilize various types of personal and behavioral information, along with the rationale behind these practices.
InformationWeCollect: We gather information, such as subscriber contact details, including but not limited to name, postal address, email address, and payment details, to provide services and products, like fulfilling subscriptions to The Economist Newspaper. For our Economist events and Intelligence services, additional details like job title, work email, company, country, and industry may be collected. When you use our online platforms or apps, we employ cookies and similar technologies to collect data such as browser, email provider, pages accessed, device, IP address, internet connection, and, in some cases, location. This information helps tailor our services and improve user experiences. We may also obtain data from third parties to enhance our understanding of you, but we do not track or collect sensitive information unless under exceptional circumstances.
AgeAndChildren: The Economist Newspaper Limited processes limited personal data of individuals aged 16 to 18 to fulfill subscriptions. Where we do so, we minimize the data collected and where required, we ask schools to obtain parental or guardian consent for this data processing. Please see The Economist Educational Foundation’s separate privacy policy for more information on how it processes children’s data.
ChangingOurPrivacyNotice: From time to time, we may make changes to our privacy policy. This may be in relation to changes in the law, best practice, or changes in our services. These changes will be reflected in this statement, so you should check here regularly
